---

## Problem

What problem does this feature solve? What pain point does it address?

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered other approaches? What are the tradeoffs?

## Alignment with Vision

How does this feature align with WorkOrder's goals of making maintenance clearer or more reliable?

See [Vision](../../docs/vision.md) for reference.

## Additional Context

Any other relevant information, examples, or use cases.
